location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire, to Charles Jones, Surgeon in Medical Charge of the Bussorah [Basra] Residency

mods.abstract: Acknowledges receipt of Jones' letter dated 3 August 1826 enclosing a despatch addressed to the Medical Board for Stannus's perusal. Stannus informs Jones that the Resident at Bussorah is independent of his control and he cannot interfere with his arrangements.
